game.name: Vault of the Vanquished
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Vault of the Vanquished is a rogue-like adventure where you have been sent to the afterlife, after you were killed by the kings orders. You have now been resurrected and now you can collect and unlock hundreds of cards, to vanquish as many enemies as possible and bring peace to your Kingdom.
